texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: The first time you let me cut your hair was in that garage, remember? Ah, the memories.
Standing in front of the mirror, I reminisce about that summer as I check out how much hair I'll be working with.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: You still cutting hair?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Nope. I'm in charge of hair and makeup.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Huh, that so?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Yeah. I was flip-flopping between being a hairstylist or a beautician until the last minute, but I went with this because I really like helping people with their makeup.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Heh, makes sense.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: You're pretty used to getting your makeup done, huh? The life of a model finally agreeing with you?

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: I'm on the wane already. Not like I had much time in the spotlight to begin with, being a late bloomer and all.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: But you've still done more than some do in their whole careers! You're making history! It's amazing!

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Thanks to a certain someone.
Azuki closes her eyes.
I softly apply the eyeliner.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Who would have thought the day he called me for a shoot would come?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: He's been waiting for this a long time, you know? He was the first in line to ask for you as soon as your exclusivity contract with the magazine ended.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: This is just my side gig. My main business is still being a scrap hunter.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Why don't you buy a new car already? I bet you get paparazzi tailing you all day.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: They don't bother with me. You think they have time to chase after a minor model sporting an exclusive contract with some dumb mag?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: You are sooo out of the loop! Do you even read the magazine you work with? It's the biggest fashion mag in the business!

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Well, it hasn't changed me one bit. I'm still living in that Hachimaru.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: You're like the main character of some American movie. Pretty cool, girl.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Man, I see you're as peppy as ever.
Azuki remarks, her eyes still closed.
She's really damn gorgeous.
I'm used to dealing with models in my line of work, but Azuki's still breathtaking compared to them.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: What do you want for dinner today? You cool with a nabe pot?

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Huh? You wanna eat a fricking hot pot in summer?!

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: But it's so easy to make! We have it three times a week at home.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: I don't really care, to be honest.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Okay! Let's pick up some ingredients on the way back.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: You guys are living together, right?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Yeah.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Well, I'm glad you two are happy together.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: I don't know about that.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Eh?!

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: He's really popular among the models. I can't hold a candle to them...

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: I've never experienced jealousy like this before. And he's gotten a lot cheekier since the last time you saw him.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: I mean, what do you make of that name?

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Oh, his pen name?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Yeah. I'm still really mad at you for that.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: How is it my fault?!

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: You're the one who gave it to him!

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: And he's the one that owned it. Nothing to do with me.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: I guess...

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: This is, what? His third book?

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: The third entry to the photo book series of the rising young star, Candy Amei.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: I'd appreciate it if you didn't say that name in front of me.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Azuki's coming onto the set!

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: A pleasure, y'all. Looking forward to the shoot.

texts.name: Staff
texts.text: Good day, Ma'am!
I go up to Sumomo and Azuki as soon as I see them come in.
Neither of them have changed one bit.
They look just like they did that summer.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Thanks for coming, Azuki.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Don't even mention it. This old lady's honored to be asked for at all.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: That's not true. A belleza like yours cannot be withered by age.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: I'll tell you about it in detail later, but I want my next book to be about my memorias.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Memorias?
I nod.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: When I dug through my memorias, looking to express my very alma...

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: One of the first things that came to mind was el verano we spent together.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: R-Right.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: I'm really glad to see you. I'll bring out your belleza, just leave it all to me!

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Okay?

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: I'll go get listo. Wait for me right there, my sweet damas.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Was that Candy? Or an alien wearing his skin?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: His teacher's mannerisms rubbed off on him.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: I gotta have dinner with THAT today? I feel like I'm gonna lose it.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Don't worry. He only talks like that at work.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: He goes back to his usual self when we're at home.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: I see. So he's playing the Candy Amei character.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: It's like he's not even aware he's doing it.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: You were joking about him being popular among the models, right? I can't see anyone getting over how he talks.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: They eat it right up! Apparently it's cute and funny. And his photos are always on point.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: He's popular even when he talks like a complete clown. This industry's messed up, I tell you.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Well, he is selling damn well. That's probably the biggest reason.
Kanna's shoot goes smoothly, as they always do.
But since he has another shoot later that day, we part ways so that Azuki and I can go shopping.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Kanna's shoots are pretty fun, aren't they?

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: It reminded me of working with Spencer Arashiyama. That was my first time getting photographed, so I figured all photographer types were like that.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: No way, Spencer and Candy are pretty damn unique in the industry.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: But it was fun as heck. Feels like I got enough compliments from that boy to last me two lifetimes.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Right?! He's like a different person, isn't he?

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: So that's what you fell for, eh?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Can't deny that statement.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: But it's great you get to be with your partner both at work and at home. And you're both doing what you love too!

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: You're right. It's thanks to so many people. You, Kanna's daddy, and Spencer too.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Mhm.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: You gonna be my chauffeur today?
Azuki nods.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Yippee! Let's get going! It's been ages since I saw Hachimaru!

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Come on in! It's kinda small, but make yourself at home.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Make way! Oh, this is pretty darn cozy. Bigger than Hachimaru for sure.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Ahahah! True that.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Ah, must be Kanna.
My phone vibrates, and I pick it up.
It is Kanna.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: He says he's on his way back.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: He finished up pretty early, huh?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Yeah, thankfully. When his work drags on, he tends to come back pretty late.
He said he was helping Takuma on location at one of his shoots today.
Maybe they were able to wrap up quickly because they're used to working with one another.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: I'll go get things ready. Wait a minute.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Want a hand?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Nah, I'm just chopping ingredients. I can handle that much on my own. I've been the chef around here for two years now.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Two years, huh? Time sure flies.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Word.
After that summer we spent in the garage, a lot of things changed really fast.
I quit college and enrolled at a beauty school to become a cosmetologist.
The world's communication network thingies started working again, and they were so convenient that everyone started adopting the technology into their daily lives.
The person who got the networks back online is a famous alum of the academy Kanna attended, so when I saw the news, I was immediately tempted to get in contact with him.
But I reined myself in and focused on my studies.
At the time, I felt like I still wasn't ready to see him again.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: I'm back.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Welcome home!

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Yo, Candy Amei.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: It's nice to see you. Thanks for today.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: The feeling's mutual.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Huh?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: What is it?

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Nabe?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Yep!

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Again?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: No complaining! It's easy to make!

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: But it's the third time this week.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: It's tasty and also healthy! Do you want to fatten me up or something?

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: I wouldn't really mind?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Hah! You're just saying that so you have an excuse to switch me up for one of those young models, aren't you?!

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: What? They're pretty, yeah, but my job is to take pictures of them. I wouldn't want to live with any of them.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Ngh! Are you saying I'm not pretty like them?!

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: You're still the prettiest, cutest woman I've ever laid eyes on.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: You're my one and only. Where is this coming from?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Damn you...

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Did you two forget I'm here?
The three of us sit around the table.
And just like that summer, we toast with cans of shochu highball.
I became a photographer, Sumomo a cosmetologist, and Azuki a model.
Now I'm even old enough to toast them with alcohol instead of juice.
A lot has changed.
But a lot has stayed the same too.
Hanging out like this makes me feel as though we never left the garage.
And the heat from the steamy nabe hot pot is making the room feel just as stuffy as back then.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: So, what the heck happened over the last two years for you guys to end up like this?

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: I'm pretty curious, to be honest.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Huh? Sumomo didn't tell you?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: I knew I forgot something.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: You were living together by the time we got in contact again.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: So, uh, I was the one who got in touch with Kanna first, right?

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Yeah.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: It was back when Kanna's first photo book came out.
My first photo book was released today.
I presented a collection of photos I took while helping my mentor Spencer to some publisher, and they took care of putting them together as a book.
This was one of my goals.
The book is being sold all over the country.
I'm sure Sumomo will catch wind of it.
I placed the phone number of this office in the colophon for that reason.
My overall goal was to become an accomplished and super cool photographer.
And now that I feel like I've made it, I want to go see Sumomo.
And I would, if I knew where she lived.
Back when we parted ways there were no cell phones, so I don't know how to contact her.
And that's why...
I worked hard to get my debut book published nationwide, so Sumomo will see that I became the kind of man I promised her I would.
One night when I was out drinking with Spencer, I got so drunk that I told him all about that summer.
My mentor shed silent tears as he listened to my story.
I remember him telling me what a "preciosa summer historia" it was. He's been supporting me in getting my photos published ever since.
But he also pushed me a lot harder.
Thanks to that, I got my photo book published way faster than most people in the industry.
I've been waiting for a call all day.
I'm certain...
If she's the same Sumomo I knew back then, she'll call me.
I have faith.
The hours pass by excruciatingly slowly, but just as daylight begins to fade, the office phone rings.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Hello. Spencer's office.
Kanna?
For a second, I'm rendered speechless.
It's her.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: ...Sumomo.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Ahahah! Thank goodness! It's really you!

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: You saw it?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Yes, I did. It's incredible! You got your own photo book!

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: I thought that maybe you'd contact if me I published it.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: I... worked really hard.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Yes.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: I did my best to become a super cool photographer.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Yes.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: So...

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Can I come see you?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Yes!
We decide on a time and place, and I go to meet Sumomo.
We also exchanged contact information.
I've finally connected with Sumomo again.
At last.
I can tell her what I've always wanted to.
I can ask her to become my girlfriend.
I can ask her out like I've been waiting to.
In anticipation of our meeting, I looked up a pretty snazzy restaurant nearby and reserved the best table for us.
When I make it to our meeting spot, I see she's already there.
I recognize her immediately.
On the phone, she told me she'd be wearing something I'd recognize right away.
She was right about that.
She's standing there, waiting for me...
Wearing the same outfit she did during that summer.
Pulling out my digital camera, I walk up to her stealthily.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Sumomo.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Huh?
As she turns around, I snap a picture of her.
Her eyes widen in surprise, a smile quirking the corners of her mouth.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: What's with the flashy outfit? Do I even know you?

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: I've been working on myself because I wanted to photograph you again. But I'm the same Kanna inside.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: No way! You used to be way shyer!

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: I guess, yeah.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: And you're taller.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: You haven't changed at all.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Thank goodness! I was gonna throw myself off a cliff if you said I look old.
I shake my head.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: You're the same. The same Sumomo I fell in love with.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Whoa, you're coming on strong, huh?
Despite her words, her smile is bashful and she's blushing.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Well... I made a reservation at a nearby restaurant.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Really?! Are you some big spender now?!

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Let's go.
The restaurant I take her to is spacious and classy.
I reserved a table right at the back for us.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Have you been well?

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Yeah, and you?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: I have, yes!
I nod.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: You're still working for the person your dad introduced you to, right?

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Sure am, but I still can't hold a candle to him. I'm learning new things from him every day.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Really? Is it fun?

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: It's hard work, but I enjoy it a lot. How about you? What are you doing?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Actually... I'm a cosmetologist now.
That takes me by surprise.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Really?!

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Yes! After I left that summer, I went to beauty school. It was the first time I ever felt enthusiastic about studying. Now I work on film sets and stuff all over the place.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Whoa, that's great.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: You remember the day we went to see Halley's Comet?

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Yeah.
That was July 28th.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: We went to the academy's rooftop together, remember? That night I fixed the hair and makeup of a girl who was crying over a boy.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: While I was taking pictures?
Sumomo nods.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: That girl was in the same class as you.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Even though we never really spoke at all during my two weeks of teacher training, we chatted a lot in those fifteen minutes.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Lifting someone's spirits using makeup was super fun for me. So I figured this kind of thing could be the job for me.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: I never realized.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: So I'm really glad I went through teaching training in the end.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: I met you, and it helped me realize what I really wanted to do with my life.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: That's great.
We share a bottle of sparkling wine with our meal.
I don't really know what kind of food it is. Maybe European?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Do you come to this kind of place often?

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Huh? Not really.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: I saw your photo book.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: There's lots of pictures of pretty women in it.
I nod.
In the end, I followed in the footsteps of my mentor to focus mainly on portrait photography.
My debut photo book focuses on people too.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: So I wondered if you come to this kind of place a lot.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: With models, you mean?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Yeah.
I snort.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: What was that for?!

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: It's just funny that you'd be jealous over something like that.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: I don't come to fancy places like this. My mentor sometimes invites me, but I've never been out for dinner with a model.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: I was so focused on improving my work that I never had time.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: I see.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: I reserved a table here because it's a special day.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: I don't even know what kind of food this is.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Ahahah! I'm glad to hear that. You really are still the same Kanna.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Of course I am.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: So today's a special day?
I nod without saying anything.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Why?
She quirks a mischievous smile.
The wine has brought a rosy bloom to her cheeks.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Because today is the day...

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: I can finally tell the person I love how I feel.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Sumomo.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Yes?

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: I still love you.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: This whole time we've been apart, you've always been the only one on my mind.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Mm.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: I'm not a kid anymore. I think I have what it takes now.
Sumomo smiles softly.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: So...

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: I want you to be my girlfriend, and...

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: ...maybe even my wife, someday.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: I want to go steady.
I look straight into her eyes.
Sumomo...
She looks back at me, her smile lighting up her whole face.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Yes.
We come out of the restaurant holding hands.
The warmth I've been dreaming about for so long is finally here in the palm of my hand.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Your place...

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Hm?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Is it close?
I nod.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Yours?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: It's not far, but...

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: I don't wanna go home tonight.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Can I stay over at your place?
Without a moment's hesitation, I nod.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: And then, we came here to this apartment.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: That was our first time, huh?

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Yeah, I didn't need to hear that! I could figure that out for myself! You obviously didn't come here to play video games!

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Ahahah!

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: I still remember it like it was yesterday. Can't believe it's been two years since then.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: So next you're gonna be tying the knot and living happily ever after?
Beaming, Sumomo nods.
I nod as well.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Man, it's still kinda hard for me to wrap my head around.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: I mean, back then you were a student, and she was your teacher, right?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: I was in training! I was still a student. You're the one who was way older than both of us!

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Oh, cut the crap!

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: I never expected things to turn out like this either.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Neither did Sumomo, did you?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: I guess not. Back then, I was really worried about you being younger.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Now it's no big deal, but back when you were a student it was kind of iffy.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Who cares?! Age is just a number, isn't it?!

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Ahahah! You're sooo desperate.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Am not!
The good times keep rolling, and so does time itself.
By now, the only thing left in the bottom of the pot is hardened grease.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Are you staying the night, Azuki?

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Eh? Is that late already?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Wait, you're driving, right? You sure you should be drinking?

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: It's all good.
She takes her car keys out of her pocket.
I recognize them right away.
They're for Hachimaru.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: I wanna give this back.
Her voice is quiet.
I stare blankly at her for a moment.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Uh, why? It's yours.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: You gave the Hachimaru to me because you thought your ma would be happier if I were driving it around, right?

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: But the situation's different now. When you and Peach make some babies, you gotta take the little buggers camping!

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: I bet that'd make your ma even happier.
Azuki flashes me a confident, reassuring grin.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: But weren't you living in the car?

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: I've saved up more than enough money. It's about time I look for a place to settle down.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: I'm not getting any younger.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: You still got plenty left in you! You're gorgeous! Those young models got nothing on you.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: It's fine. I've never been out to compete with anyone.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: But...

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: I've kept it well maintained. It might look the same, but that car's sturdier than it's ever been. Besides...

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: We have phones now. If anything happens, give your personal scrap hunter a call and she'll be there in a flash to fix you right up.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: It's my wedding gift. Take it, Candy.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: ...Thanks.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Yeah, thank you. You're the coolest lady in the whole wide world!

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Heh, that's a given.
After accompanying Azuki to the nearest train station, we go to the parking lot where Hachimaru's parked and get in.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Whoa! What a blast from the past!

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: It hasn't changed at all.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Hey, sooo...

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Yes?
She smiles mischievously and points towards the camp bed.
This is where we slept together on the last day of that summer.
I nod, and she lays down on the narrow bed, beckoning to me.
We cuddle up together, just as we did that day.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Kanna.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Yes?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: I'm super happy. Just knowing I get to spend all my days together with you like this makes me feel all warm and fuzzy inside.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Me too.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Every moment with you is the most fun I've ever had.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Let's make lots of babies and stay together until we're both old and wrinkly.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: There's nowhere I'd rather be.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: But make sure you don't die before me. I'd miss you horribly.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: No way. I don't wanna live without you either.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Ahahah! We're both dummies in love, huh?

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: That's okay by me.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Yeah. I like being a dummy a lot. I'm so glad I was never the brightest tool in the shed.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: When we have kids, let's bring them up well, okay?

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Hmm... You think I'll end up like my dad?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Ahahah! I bet you will!
All of a sudden...
Memories of Mom, indomitable as a storm, and of Dad, a serious man of few words, fill my mind.
I wonder if we'll become a married couple like they were.
Now wouldn't that be something.
